sourcesContent:
import { unwrapResult } from '@reduxjs/toolkit' import React from 'react' import { useState } from 'react' import { useEffect } from 'react' import { useDispatch } from 'react-redux' import { useParams } from 'react-router-dom' import { formatMoney, getProductId } from 'src/utils/helper' import ProductRating from '../ProductRating/ProductRating' import QuantityInputNumber from '../QuantityInputNumber/QuantityInputNumber' import { getProductDetail } from './productDetail.slice' import * as S from './productDetail.style' export default function ProductDetail() { const [product, setProduct] = useState({}) const { productId } = useParams() const id = getProductId(productId) const dispatch = useDispatch() useEffect(() => { const getProduct = async () => { const result = await getProductDetail(id) unwrapResult(result) setProduct(result.data) } getProduct() }, []) return (
{product && (
{product.images.map((image, index) => ( ))} {product.name} {product.rating} {product.view} lượt xem {formatMoney(product.sold)} đã bán đ {product.price_before_discount} đ {product.price} số lượng {product.quantity} sản phẩm có sẵn thêm vào giỏ hàng mô tả sản phẩm
)}
) }
